attributes.action: Ban HGV's and slow moving vehicles such as tractors (excluding all emergency vehicles) from the road between the hours 6am and 6pm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have you been stuck in a queue of traffic behind an HGV travelling at 45mph on a 60mph road, or worse still, a tractor? How many times have you seen the impatience of people just trying to get to work and back home, carry out crazy manoeuvres to overtake the said vehicle/s? If the traffic were allowed to flow freely, surely there would be a decrease in car accidents.
